personal.name: Aditya Singh
personal.title: Software Developer
personal.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. I create efficient, scalable solutions that make a difference.

about.intro: I'm a passionate software engineer with a strong foundation in full-stack development and competitive programming.
journey: With a Computer Science degree from Madan Mohan Malaviya University of Technology, I've built a strong foundation in software engineering principles and modern web technologies.

Currently working as a Software Engineer at Trendlyne Technologies, where I've contributed to significant performance improvements and user experience enhancements. My experience spans from frontend React applications to backend Node.js services.
Beyond professional work, I'm passionate about competitive programming, having solved 700+ problems on LeetCode and achieving notable ranks in prestigious contests like ICPC.

responsibilities: Spearheaded Smart Options development, enhancing user experience by 100%
Optimized application performance by 2X through troubleshooting and refinement
Boosted organic traffic by 70% through strategic SEO implementation
Improved page metrics (LCP, FCP, CLS, TBT) by 45%
Implemented Web Workers for efficient background processing
Modernized event admin panel with generic components
Collaborated on 10+ projects using JavaScript and React
Engineered robust authentication system for flagship website
Wrote comprehensive test cases using Cypress
